title: IAA Tonight | Is the Pressure Really on Tua?
description: We continue our Countdown to Kickoff with a stop at the Miami Dolphins. Tua Tagovailoa has been taking a lot of heat since he's entered the league, but is the pressure really on him to perform this season? Plus, Carson Wentz was asked some tough questions recently by a local reporter, and Commanders president Jason Wright wasn't too thrilled at how they were asked. Was Wright correct in his criticism of the questions?
author: smanderville@houseofathlete.com (Leger Douzable, Adam Pacman Jones, Ashley Nicole Moss)
